title: Third-party and independent candidates for the 2020 United States presidential election
Third-party and independent candidates for the 2020 United States presidential election
added: Presidential candidates could attain ballot access in Colorado for a fee of $1,000,<ref>https://ballotpedia.org/Ballot_access_requirements_for_presidential_candidates_in_Colorado</ref>, in Louisiana for $500,<ref>https://ballotpedia.org/Ballot_access_requirements_for_presidential_candidates_in_Louisiana</ref>, and for the asking in Vermont as that state waived it's petitioning requirement due to COVID-19.<ref>https://ballot-access.org/2020/04/02/vermont-waives-petition-requirements-for-2020-primary-and-general-elections/</ref>  Most candidates with access in just one state are on the ballot in one of these three or were rogue nominations by a state affiliate that did not support the national party nominee.
